title: Champion Banning Noises in Champ Select are very Loud
body:
I've played a few games on the Alpha now, and every time i get a match I jump a bit after I hear the first ban. I don't know if it is just me or it is purposely this loud, but I think there could be an Audio setting for it. Other than that I like the animations and the overall astetics. Keep up the good work Riot!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Audio settings will get more controls that will allow you to configure more of the sound volumes in the client.

Thanks for your kind words!
